item.title: Interplanetary Gatsby: The Complete Beginner's Guide to Deploying Your First Static Website to IPFS: another cool thing I should try!
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Interplanetary Gatsby: The Complete Beginner's Guide to Deploying Your First Static Website to IPFS
  • Gotta try it!

item.title: Make a tshirt or sticker or some such swag from the thumbnails of a pdf of bugzilla text contributions (e.g. new bugs, comments, metadata changes) or kitsune text contributions (e.g. SUMO KB article edits)
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Inspired by my previous post from April 21, 2019 : Idea: make a tshirt with the m*eller report r*dacted with 50% of the thumbnails on front and 50% on back and call it of course 'mrstardacted'
  • Text thumbnails of open source contributions as art for the win :-) (I'd make my thumbnails pink on white instead of black on white naturally or maybe even white on pink)

item.title: Reinstalling the Realtek audio drivers fixed the 'audio not working when switching from USB to builtin Surface Book 2 speakers' problem, could this also explain my May 27, 2019 audio issue?
item.description:
Pontifications

  • See May 17, 2019: USB Audio didn't work but USB microphone did. Vidyo problem? Hardware problem with Surface Book 2 USB?
  • So krazy! Never had audio issues like this with multiple MacBooks over the last 15 years!

item.title: May 17, 2019: USB Audio didn't work but USB microphone did. Vidyo problem? Hardware problem with Surface Book 2 USB?
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Oddly normal headphones worked which makes it seem to my non-hardware-knowledge-encumbered-self :-) that it's a USB hardware problem with my Surface Book 2.
  • Previous Hardware Problems:
    • May 11, 2019
    • March 27, 2019
    • April 12, 2019

item.title: McGuckian Shane: Scraping Reddit with PRAW
item.description:
Pontifications

  • very cool and seemingly easily: Scraping Reddit with PRAW
  • better than manually reading Reddit :-)

item.title: Tom MacWright's Big Presentation system looks great and it works on glitch
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Read all about it in Tom MacWright: Big 4.
  • Need to try Big on Glitch!

item.title: OutlinerSoftware.com is an old skool forum for outliners, PIMs and Knowledge management software
On May 9, 2019, my Surface Book 2 Keyboard and Touchpad stopped working
item.description:
Pontifications

  • The touchscreen worked though and plugging in an external USB keyboard and mouse also worked.
  • Even more mysterious the keyboard and mouse started working a few minutes later without me changing anything.
  • See further Surface Book 2 Hardware issues blog posts from March 27, 2019 and April 12, 2018

item.title: S*msung Note 8 on F*do received the Google April Security Patch on May 11, 2019
item.description:
Pontifications

  • For the record, 1 month behind on security updates is not great for a $1000 phone. #ymmv :-) Thanks S*msung and F*do for the unnecessary delay!

item.title: Dan Hill: Avo, Stadia, Arcade, Bandersnatch, and the New Grammar of Television (and Games) — Part 1: Form is substance
item.description:
Pontifications

  • Not convinced by Avo, Stadia, Arcade, Bandersnatch, and the New Grammar of Television (and Games) — Part 1: Form is substance but I'm certainly intrigued!
